title: Pasta Basta
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Italian, Israeli, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. In the Machane Yehuda market. From lunchtime into late evening the menu features vegetarian, vegan, and fish. Has in-house-made pasta, penne and fettucine with gnocchi as a hidden item (ask), plus soup and salad. Complimentary iced water. Closed Shabat.
